name: 18 Hits Golf
description:
How far can you go in 18 Hits?

10 points: Hole in one
2 points: Two hits
1 point: Three or More than three hits

You have 18 hits in total. More than 40 goals to achieve. Each attempt reduces one hit. But getting
a star on the way adds 3 more hits. Do the math while hitting the golf ball.

18 Hits Golf is a 2D mini golfing game. Realistic physics and one-finger-control free you from tradition
golf game. Sounds easy to play but definitely tricky to get a high score.

Relax in soothing graphics, challenge yourself!

Features:

---One-finger-control tap and drag.
---Tricky scoring mechanism.
---Realistic physics engine.
---Relaxing soothing graphics.
